alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Garland and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meyers, or 12 miles east of Mount Ida, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meyers... Avant... Royal... Silver... Crystal Springs Landing... Sunshine... Hempwallace... Pearcy... Crystal Springs... Hurricane Grove... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
